name: Mr Stitches
short_description: Mr. Stitches custom Print & Embroidery. Customize products with your own custom design, or choose from any of our thousands of designs online. Here at Mr. Stitches Custom Embroidery we wanted to change things up. We know that shopping is not just a means to and end, but more so an experience. And although we love going to our local shopping mall from time to time, certain purchases are better done right from the convenience of your computer. This is why we have created Mr. Stitches Online Custom Embroidery to offer you an online shopping experience to order custom embroidered apparel and merchandise like polos, caps, hoodies, baby gear, uniforms, etc… You choose the apparel you want to customize, add a unique design and Mr. Stitches takes care of the rest.
